messages.title: Delivering for our community
messages.content: Bath is beautiful, green and creative city. But it can be even better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve has pledged his support for local parents fighting to save Bath's smallest secondary school.
Steve is committed to ensuring the new cancer centre is built on time and on budget.
The Lib Dems on the council have been working to cut congestion, and they are continuing to support the city's business by opposing a damaging one-way system proposal.
Celebrating 9,000 jobs & 3,000 homes! Steve backs new homes to secure jobs and keep young people in Bath.

issues.economy: In 2010, Lib Dems stepped up to take the lead to get our economy back on track.
issues.education: Steve has pledged his support for local parents fighting to save Bath's smallest secondary school.
issues.environment: Bath Lib Dem Councillors are leading on delivering for you on everyday issues like clearing up our parks.
issues.governance: Bath Lib Dem Councillors - The Community Champions.
issues.health: Steve is committed to ensuring the new cancer centre is built on time and on budget.

housing.content: Celebrating 9,000 jobs & 3,000 homes! Steve backs new homes to secure jobs and keep young people in Bath.

leaflet.personalStatement: I never thought I'd have to save my son's school.

politicalExperience.achievements: Steve Bradley is working alongside Don Foster MP as Bath's Lib Dem Parliamentary Candidate. He wants to help make our great city even better.

endorsements.endorsement: Don Foster MP is supporting Steve Bradley as the candidate who can make our city even better.

quotes.text: Steve is a fantastic local candidate, who really understands the issues facing people across Bath.
